name: Heart Pattern (For Sock Heel)
description: This is a pattern that I had created for the back heel of my Heart Clog Socks. It was fun to do and thought it might be a good pattern to share. It can be used for other projects (graph included on the pattern sheet) or incorporated in projects that you are creating. Although this was created for a particular heel on a sock the graph can be used for other projects. Be creative…and have fun!
full_text: This is a pattern that I had created for the back heel of my Heart Clog Socks. It was fun to do and thought it might be a good pattern to share. It can be used for other projects (graph included on the pattern sheet) or incorporated in projects that you are creating. Although this was created for a particular heel on a sock the graph can be used for other projects. Be creative…and have fun! Basic sock used on this sock is “Seduction Sock” from Knittingdaily.com… “Interweave” magazine offered this pattern free.Enjoy and have fun knitting the heart into all of your projects.
